Comment.Language: For Hosanna Sunday or the Feast of the Cross (Ps 64:1-2):

Text.Language: Nyok Vnou] f~ersau nak n~je pijw qen Ciwn: eue~] nak n~oueu,/ qen Ieroucal/m. Cwtem Vnou] e~tap~roceu,/ je cen/ou harok n~je carx niben.
Praise is due to You, O God, in Zion; and to You the vow shall be performed in Jerusalem. O God, hear my prayer, to You all flesh will come.
